Class.ClassComment: CollectableLoadFunc /** * This interface implemented by a {@link LoadFunc} implementations indicates to Pig that it has the capability to load data such that all instances of a key will occur in same split. * @since Pig 0.7 */

Method.MethodComment: /** * When this method is called, Pig is communicating to the Loader that it must load data such that all instances of a key are in same split. Pig will make no further checks at runtime to ensure whether the contract is honored or not. * @throws IOException */
